word: Dear Sister Cady, we hope and pray that the Lord will give you help and strength under the severe taxation that is upon you. That God who saw Nathanael under the fig tree sees you, and understands all your griefs and all your sorrows. The Lord Jesus will be your strength in this day of your affliction.--Letter 16, 1896, pp. 1, 2. (To Brother and Sister Cady, November 17, 1896.)
